text: == Events == * Spartacus leads the slaves against Rome. His army was eventually defeated, and Spartacus is killed in battle, by Roman legionaries under Marcus Licinius Crassus. * In Rome, Marcus Aemilius Lepidus becomes the third member of the Second Triumvirate, with Mark Antony and Octavian. * The city of Tigranakert of Artsakh is built in Armenia. * Salome Alexandria becomes queen of Judea after her husband dies. * Hycarnus II becomes the high priest of Jerusalem until 66 BC. * Pamplona is built in Spain
title: 70s BC
